00033 CDWriter::CDWriter( autojet *parent, QSettings *settings, int number)
00034 {
00035         // Set parent?
00036         aj = parent;
00037 
00038         // Create containers
00039         minContainer = new QWidget( this );
00040         uiMin.setupUi( minContainer );
00041         
00042         maxContainer = new QWidget( this );
00043         uiMax.setupUi( maxContainer );
00044 
00045         // Connect signals
00046         connect( uiMax.eject, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( eject() ) );
00047         connect( uiMax.create, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( create() ) );
00048         connect( uiMax.blank, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( blank() ) );
00049         connect( uiMax.burn, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( burn() ) );
00050         connect( uiMax.image, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( select() ) );
00051 
00052         // Set item colors
00053         bgColor = minContainer->palette().color( minContainer->backgroundRole() );
00054         processColor = QColor( 255, 246, 0 );
00055         finishedColor = QColor( 23, 178, 109 );
00056         errorColor = QColor( 249, 0, 0 );
00057 
00058         // Distinguish impair items by darker colors
00059         if( number % 2 ) {
00060                 bgColor = bgColor.dark( 110 );
00061                 processColor = processColor.dark( 110 );
00062                 finishedColor = finishedColor.dark( 110 );
00063                 errorColor = errorColor.dark( 110 );
00064                 QPalette p=minContainer->palette();
00065                 p.setColor(minContainer->backgroundRole(), bgColor);
00066                 minContainer->setPalette(p);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // Define item number
00070         uiMin.number->setText( QString::number( number ) );
00071         uiMax.number->setText( QString::number( number ) );
00072 
00073         /*
00074         0 means no file selected
00075         1 means ISO image selected
00076         2 means DVD-ISO
00077         3 means Cue-Sheet using cdrdao
00078         */
00079 
00080         mode = 0;
00081         cuefile = false;
00082         wasburning = false;
00083         waseject = false;
00084 
00085         settings->beginGroup( QString::number( number ) );
00086         device = settings->value( "device", "/" ).toString();
00087         uiMax.speedBox->setValue( settings->value( "speed", 0 ).toInt() );
00088         driveropts = settings->value( "options", "burnfree" ).toString();
00089         uiMax.simulation->setChecked( settings->value( "simulation", false ).toBool() );
00090         uiMax.ejectBox->setChecked( settings->value( "eject", true ).toBool() );
00091         settings->endGroup();
00092 
00093         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00094         imagedir = settings->value("imagedir", "/" ).toString();
00095         settings->endGroup();
00096 
00097         procModel = new QProcess();
00098         connect( procModel, SIGNAL( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ),
00099                  this, SLOT( finishedInfo( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ) );
00100         connect( procModel, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardOutput() ), this, SLOT( readLineInfo() ) );
00101         connect( procModel, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardError() ), this, SLOT( readLineInfo() ) );
00102         procModel->start( "cdrecord", QStringList() << "dev=" + device <<
00103                                 "-prcap" );
00104 
00105         minimize();
00106 }

00116         minContainer->hide();
00117         maxContainer->show();

00124         maxContainer->hide();
00125         minContainer->show();

00136 // Ejects and loads the tray
00137 void CDWriter::eject( void )
00138 {
00139         if (!isIdle()) return;
00140 
00141         process = new QProcess( this );
00142 
00143         connect( process, SIGNAL( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ),
00144                  this, SLOT( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ) );
00145 
00146         setIdle( false );
00147         
00148         process->start( "eject", QStringList() << "-T" << device );
00149 }

00160 // TODO implement "blank=all" alternative
00161 // TODO implement dvd+rw blanking (dvd+rw-format -force /dev/dvd)
00162 // TODO merge with burn? (Duplicate code)
00163 void CDWriter::blank( void )
00164 {
00165         if ( mode == 0 || !isIdle() ) return;
00166         
00167         QString program;
00168         QStringList arguments;
00169         process = new QProcess( this );
00170 
00171         setIdle( false );
00172 
00173         program = "cdrecord";
00174                 
00175         arguments << "dev=" + device
00176                 << "blank=fast"
00177                 << "-v" << "-v";
00178 
00179         append( "Starting: " + program + " " + arguments.join( " " ) );
00180 
00181         connect( process, SIGNAL( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ),
00182                  this, SLOT( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ) );
00183         connect( process, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardOutput() ), this, SLOT( readLine() ) );
00184         connect( process, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardError() ), this, SLOT( readLine() ) );
00185 
00186         aj->addLog( "[" + QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString( "yyyyMMdd hh:mm" ) + "] " +
00187                   filelist.join( "," ) + "\n" );
00188 
00189         uiMax.idleBox->setText( tr("Blanking") );
00190         wasburning = true;
00191 
00192         process->start( program, arguments );
00193 
00194         QPalette p=uiMax.idleBox->palette();
00195         p.setColor(uiMax.idleBox->backgroundRole(), processColor);
00196         uiMax.idleBox->setPalette(p);
00197 
00198         p=minContainer->palette();
00199         p.setColor(minContainer->backgroundRole(), processColor);
00200         minContainer->setPalette(p);
00201 }

00203 // TODO Autodetect Image type (ISO or CueSheet)
00204 void CDWriter::imagefile( QString file )
00205 {
00206         if (!isIdle()) return;
00207         
00208         QFileInfo getsize( file );
00209         
00210         filelist.clear();
00211         filelist.append( file );
00212         
00213         uiMax.size->setText( "ISO: "+QString::number( getsize.size() / 1024 / 1024 )+ " MB" );
00214         append( tr( "ISO Image selected: ") + file );
00215         
00216         uiMax.tracks->clear();
00217         uiMax.tracks->append( tr("ISO Image: ") + file.section('/', -1) );
00218 
00219         uiMin.track->setText( file.section('/', -1) );
00220         uiMax.track->setText( uiMin.track->text() );
00221         
00222         mode = 1;
00223 }

00248 void CDWriter::cuefile( QString file )
00249 {
00250         if (!isIdle()) return;
00251         
00252         filelist.clear();
00253         filelist.append( file );
00254

00266 
00267 int CDWriter::calculateCueSize( QString filename )
00268 {
00269         int size = 0;
00270         QFile f( filename );
00271         if ( !f.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) )
00272                 return 0;
00273         
00274         QFileInfo fd( filename );
00275         QString dir = fd.dir().absolutePath();
00276         
00277         QTextStream in(&f);
00278         while (!in.atEnd())
00279         {
00280                 QString line = in.readLine();
00281                 
00282                 if ( line.indexOf( "FILE" ) == -1 )
00283                         continue;
00284                 
00285                 int marker1 = line.indexOf( "\"" );
00286                 int marker2 = line.indexOf( "\"", marker1 + 1);
00287                 
00288                 QFileInfo binFile( dir + "/" + line.mid( marker1 + 1, marker2 - marker1 -1 ) );
00289                 
00290                 size += binFile.size();
00291         }
00292                 
00293         return size;
00294 }
00295 */
00296 
00297 void CDWriter::burn( void )
00298 {
00299         if ( mode == 0 || !isIdle() ) return;
00300 
00301         QString program;
00302         QStringList arguments;
00303         process = new QProcess( this );
00304 
00305         setIdle( false );
00306 
00307         /* We are using cdrecord to burn CD ISO images  */
00308         if ( mode == 1 )
00309         {
00310                 program = "cdrecord";
00311                 
00312                 arguments << "dev=" + device
00313                         << "speed=" + QString::number( uiMax.speedBox->value() )
00314 // TODO:
00315 // Speeds can be obtained by doing "cdrecord -prcap"
00316 // we need to extract and parse a bunch of lines like :
00317 //   Write speed # 0:  8467 kB/s CLV/PCAV (CD  48x, DVD  6x)
00318 // to get only the :
00319 //   CD  48x, DVD  6x
00320 // part and store the 48 and 6 values for future use
00321 // This needs to be done at drive initialisation NOT here!
00322                         << "driveropts=" + driveropts
00323                         << "-v" << "-v"
00324                         << "-dao";
00325                 
00326                 if ( uiMax.simulation->isChecked() ) arguments << "--dummy";
00327 
00328                 arguments << "--data";
00329 
00330                 arguments << filelist;
00331         }
00332 
00333         /* We are using growisofs to burn DVD ISO images */
00334         if ( mode == 2 )
00335         {
00336                 program = "growisofs";
00337                 
00338                 arguments << "-dvd-compat";
00339                 if ( uiMax.speedBox->value() > 0 ) arguments << "-speed=" + QString::number( uiMax.speedBox->value() );
00340                 arguments << "-use-the-force-luke=tty";
00341                 if ( uiMax.simulation->isChecked() ) arguments << "-use-the-force-luke=dummy";
00342                 arguments << "-Z";
00343                 arguments << device + "=" + filelist.first();
00344         }
00345 
00346         /* We are using cdrdao to burn CueSheets */
00347         if ( mode == 3 )
00348         {
00349                 program = "cdrdao";
00350                 
00351                 if ( uiMax.simulation->isChecked() ) arguments << "simulate";
00352                 else arguments << "write";
00353                 arguments << "--device" << device;
00354                 if ( uiMax.speedBox->value() > 0 )
00355                 {
00356                         arguments << "--speed" << QString::number( uiMax.speedBox->value() );
00357                 }
00358                 arguments << filelist.first();
00359         }
00360 
00361         append( "Starting: " + program + " " + arguments.join( " " ) );
00362 
00363         connect( process, SIGNAL( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ),
00364                  this, SLOT( finished( int, QProcess::ExitStatus ) ) );
00365         connect( process, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardOutput() ), this, SLOT( readLine() ) );
00366         connect( process, SIGNAL( readyReadStandardError() ), this, SLOT( readLine() ) );
00367 
00368         aj->addLog( "[" + QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString( "yyyyMMdd hh:mm" ) + "] " +
00369                   filelist.join( "," ) + "\n" );
00370 
00371         //uiMax.idleBox->setPaletteBackgroundColor ( QColor( 255, 246, 0 ) );
00372         uiMax.idleBox->setText( tr("Burning") );
00373         wasburning = true;
00374 
00375         process->start( program, arguments );
00376 
00377         QPalette p=uiMax.idleBox->palette();
00378         p.setColor(uiMax.idleBox->backgroundRole(), processColor);
00379         uiMax.idleBox->setPalette(p);
00380 
00381         p=minContainer->palette();
00382         p.setColor(minContainer->backgroundRole(), processColor);
00383         minContainer->setPalette(p);
00384 }
00385 
00386 void CDWriter::finished( int exitCode, QProcess::ExitStatus )
00387 {
00388         setIdle( true );
00389 
00390         if ( wasburning && waseject ) {
00391                 wasburning = false;
00392                 waseject = false;
00393         }else if ( wasburning )
00394         {
00395                 append( tr("Exited with status ") + QString::number( exitCode ) );
00396                 
00397                 if ( exitCode == 0 )
00398                 {
00399                         QPalette p=uiMax.idleBox->palette();
00400                         p.setColor(uiMax.idleBox->backgroundRole(), finishedColor);
00401                         uiMax.idleBox->setPalette(p);
00402 
00403                         p=minContainer->palette();
00404                         p.setColor(minContainer->backgroundRole(), finishedColor);
00405                         minContainer->setPalette(p);
00406                         
00407                         uiMax.idleBox->setText( "Success" );
00408                 } else
00409                 {
00410                         QPalette p=uiMax.idleBox->palette();
00411                         p.setColor( uiMax.idleBox->backgroundRole(), errorColor);
00412                         uiMax.idleBox->setPalette(p);
00413 
00414                         p=minContainer->palette();
00415                         p.setColor( minContainer->backgroundRole(), errorColor);
00416                         minContainer->setPalette(p);
00417                         
00418                         uiMax.idleBox->setText( "Error" );
00419                 }       
00420         } else
00421         {
00422                 QPalette p=minContainer->palette();
00423                 p.setColor(minContainer->backgroundRole(), bgColor);
00424                 minContainer->setPalette(p);
00425                 uiMax.idleBox->setPalette( palette() );
00426 
00427                 uiMax.idleBox->setText( "Idle" );
00428         }
00429         
00430         delete process;
00431         
00432         if ( uiMax.ejectBox->isChecked() && wasburning )
00433         {
00434                 eject();
00435                 waseject = true;
00436         } else {
00437                 wasburning = false;
00438         }
00439 }

00446 void CDWriter::readLineInfo( void )
00447 {
00448         QString temp = procModel->readAllStandardOutput();
00449         QString _model = temp;
00450 
00451         if ( _model.indexOf( "Vendor_info" ) != -1 )
00452         {
00453                 _model = _model.right( _model.length() - ( _model.indexOf( "Vendor_info    : '" ) + 18 ) );
00454                 _model = _model.left( _model.indexOf( "'" ) );
00455                 model = _model.trimmed();
00456                 uiMax.model->setText( tr("Drive OK") );
00457         }
00458 
00459         _model = temp;
00460 
00461         if ( _model.indexOf( "Identification" ) != -1 )
00462         {
00463                 _model = _model.right( _model.length() - ( _model.indexOf( "Identification : '" ) + 18 ) );
00464                 _model = _model.left( _model.indexOf( "'" ) );
00465                 model = model + " " + _model.trimmed();
00466                 uiMax.model->setText( tr("Drive OK") );
00467         }
00468 }

00470 // If process has finished
00471 void CDWriter::finishedInfo( int, QProcess::ExitStatus )
00472 {

00475 }
00476 
00477 void CDWriter::readLine( void )
00478 {
00479         QString in = process->readAllStandardOutput();
00480         if ( mode == 1 && in.indexOf( "remaining" ) != -1 )
00481         {
00482                 setStatus( in );
00483                 return;
00484         }
00485         if ( in[0] == 0x0d ) {
00486                 setStatus( in );
00487         } else {
00488                 append( in );
00489         }
00490         
00491         QString err = process->readAllStandardError();
00492         if ( mode == 2 && err.indexOf( "Wrote" ) != -1 && err.indexOf( "blocks" ) == -1 )
00493         {
00494                 setStatus( err );
00495         } else
00496                 uiMax.errors->append( err ) ;
00497 }
00498 
00499 void CDWriter::setStatus( QString str )
00500 {
00501         int written, towrite, fifoi, bufi;
00502         QString speed;
00503         
00504         if ( mode == 1 ) // using cdrecord
00505         {
00506                 written = str.mid( 11, 4).toInt();
00507                 towrite = str.mid( 19, 4).toInt();
00508                 fifoi = str.mid( 41, 3 ).toInt();
00509                 bufi = str.mid( 52, 3 ).toInt();
00510                 speed = str.mid( 59, 5);
00511                 uiMin.progressBar->setValue( (written * 100) / towrite );
00512                 uiMax.progressBar->setValue( (written * 100) / towrite );
00513                 uiMax.fifoBar->setValue( fifoi );
00514                 uiMax.bufferBar->setValue( bufi );
00515                 uiMax.currSpeed->setText( "Current Speed: " + speed );
00516         }
00517         
00518         if ( mode == 2 ) // using growisofs
00519         {
00520                 int indexOfer = str.indexOf( "%" );
00521                 uiMin.progressBar->setValue( str.mid( indexOfer-4, 2 ).toInt() );
00522                 uiMax.progressBar->setValue( str.mid( indexOfer-4, 2 ).toInt() );
00523                 indexOfer = str.indexOf( "@" );
00524                 int indexOfer2 = str.indexOf( ",");
00525                 uiMax.currSpeed->setText( "Current Speed: " + str.mid( indexOfer+1, indexOfer2-indexOfer-1 ) );
00526                 indexOfer = str.indexOf( "RBU" );
00527                 indexOfer2 = str.indexOf( ".", indexOfer );
00528                 uiMax.fifoBar->setValue( str.mid( indexOfer+4, indexOfer2-indexOfer-4 ).toInt() );
00529         }
00530                 
00531         if ( mode == 3 ) // using cdrdao
00532         {
00533                 int indexOfer = str.indexOf( "of" );
00534                 int indexOfer2 = str.indexOf ( "MB" );
00535                 if ( str.mid( indexOfer +3, indexOfer2 - indexOfer - 3 ).toInt() != 0 )
00536                 {
00537                         uiMin.progressBar->setValue( ( str.mid( 6, indexOfer - 6 ).toInt() * 100 ) /
00538                                         str.mid( indexOfer + 3, indexOfer2 - indexOfer - 3 ).toInt() );
00539                         uiMax.progressBar->setValue( ( str.mid( 6, indexOfer - 6 ).toInt() * 100 ) /
00540                                         str.mid( indexOfer + 3, indexOfer2 - indexOfer - 3 ).toInt() );
00541                 }
00542                 indexOfer = str.indexOf( "Buffers" ) + 8;
00543                 indexOfer2 = str.indexOf( "%" );
00544                 int indexOfer3 = str.lastIndexOf( "%" );
00545                 uiMax.fifoBar->setValue( str.mid( indexOfer, indexOfer2 - indexOfer ).toInt() );
00546                 uiMax.bufferBar->setValue( str.mid( indexOfer2 + 2, indexOfer3 - indexOfer2 - 2).toInt() );
00547         }
00548 }
00549 
00550 void CDWriter::select( void )
00551 {
00552         QString isoFilter = tr( "ISO Images (*.iso)" );
00553         QString cueFilter = tr( "Cue Sheets (*.cue *.toc)");
00554         QString *outFilter = new QString();
00555         QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00556                         tr("Select Image to burn"),
00557                         imagedir, isoFilter + "\n" + cueFilter, 0 );
00558 
00559         if ( file.isNull() )
00560         {
00561                 return;
00562         }
00563 
00564         if ( *outFilter == cueFilter )
00565                 cuefile = true;
00566         else
00567                 cuefile = false;
00568 
00569         imagefile( file );
00570 }
00571 
00572 void CDWriter::setIdle( bool isIdle )
00573 {
00574         idle = isIdle;
00575         uiMax.idleBox->setChecked( idle );
00576 
00577         if ( !isIdle )
00578         {
00579                 uiMax.eject->setEnabled( false );
00580                 uiMax.create->setEnabled( false );
00581                 uiMax.blank->setEnabled( false );
00582                 uiMax.image->setEnabled( false );
00583                 uiMax.burn->setEnabled( false );
00584         } else
00585         {
00586                 uiMax.eject->setEnabled( true );
00587                 uiMax.create->setEnabled( true );
00588                 uiMax.blank->setEnabled( true );
00589                 uiMax.image->setEnabled( true );
00590                 uiMax.burn->setEnabled( true );
00591         }
00592 }
